name: get_album_metadata
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
API description: Fetches full metadata details of a specified album using the Spotify Scraper API.

albumid.description: The unique ID of the album for which metadata is to be retrieved.
